mobiles.name: rat large
mobiles.long_description: A large rat scurries into the darkness
mobiles.description:
Small dark eyes gleam at you.
It sniffs the air once and darts away quickly.

mobiles.name: spider
mobiles.long_description: A large spider sits patiently in its web
mobiles.description:
Long spindly hairy legs rest on some web strands feeling for prey. 
Its large hairy body is marked by a large orange stripe.

mobiles.name: priest drunk
mobiles.long_description: A balding man grunts and sweats as a woman writhes beneath him
mobiles.description:
His naked hairy bum thrusts vigorously
up and down over the woman beneath him.
He pauses mid-thrust, belches, 
and drinks deeply from a wine skin.

mobiles.name: nun
mobiles.long_description: A barely clad woman moans in pleasure beneath a drunken priest
mobiles.description:
Her nails claw at the the priests back, 
and she moans in delight with every thrust.
As he pauses to get a drink, she wraps
her thighs around him and forces him deeper in.

mobiles.name: skeleton
mobiles.long_description: A skeleton wanders here
mobiles.description: Ancient bronze armour hides most of the bones from view

mobiles.name: zombie
mobiles.long_description: A slightly rotten corpse wanders here
mobiles.description: Greying flesh hangs in tatters from yellowed bones.

mobiles.name: ghoul
mobiles.long_description: A greyish figure wanders here
mobiles.description:
Greying skin is stretched tautly over the bones beneath, 
and a charnal odour assails your nostrils

mobiles.name: ghost
mobiles.long_description: A ghost flits around here
mobiles.description:
A shadowy shape flits before you.
Its form only vaguely discernable.

mobiles.name: necromancer mage
mobiles.long_description: A figure wearing dark robes is here
mobiles.description:
As you enter he looks at you disdainfully
pauses... thinks for a moment. And says.

'Ah.. Excellent. 
 Another volounteer for my army of darkness'

mobiles.name: adventurer wandering
mobiles.long_description: A wandering adventurer searches for excitement here
mobiles.description:
He is poorly equipped, dressed only in
badly patched armour, and wielding a club
so shoddy, it is little more than a piece
of branch.

mobiles.name: skeleton
mobiles.long_description: A skeleton wanders around
mobiles.description:
Ancient yellowed bones are proteceted by
bronze armour just as old.

mobiles.name: zombie
mobiles.long_description: A zombie staggers into view
mobiles.description: It's flesh hangs in tatters, as it mindlessly wanders these ancient halls.

mobiles.name: ghoul
mobiles.long_description: A gaunt figure lurches towards you
mobiles.description:
A starved looking ghoul, as it draws near
you can smell the stench of rotting flesh.

mobiles.name: ghost spirit
mobiles.long_description: A spirit wanders aimlessly about these passageways
mobiles.description:
A vague shimmering form hangs in the air.
An empty sounding howl emerges from it,
full of anguish and remorse.

mobiles.name: adventurer brave
mobiles.long_description: A strong bright eyed man wanders around, cheerfully whistling.
mobiles.description: He seems well equipped for a foray against the undead in this place.

mobiles.name: skeleton
mobiles.long_description: A skeleton wanders aimlessly
mobiles.description:
An ancient warrior has been brought back
from the dead.

mobiles.name: zombie
mobiles.long_description: A zombie shuffles about
mobiles.description:
A recently deceased corpse has been
reanimated and left to wander.

mobiles.name: ghoul
mobiles.long_description: A ghoul sees you and attacks hungrily.
mobiles.description:
A starved looking once human creature.
Its flesh is a diseased grey, and an
awful smell wafts from it.

mobiles.name: ghost
mobiles.long_description: A ghost flits forelornly about.
mobiles.description: An indistinct form hovers in the air.

mobiles.name: adventurer lost
mobiles.long_description: A man wanders nervously around
mobiles.description:
He seems only just equipped to survive
down here. As you draw near he shouts

'Hello friend..
 By any chance do you know the way out ?'

mobiles.name: thief man
mobiles.long_description: A thief seems to be looking out for something
mobiles.description:
A man of average height, average build.
He seems to be nondescript to the nth degree.

objects.name: key iron
objects.description: An iron key looks uninteresting

objects.name: key iron
objects.description: An iron key looks uninteresting

objects.name: key iron
objects.description: An iron key looks uninteresting

objects.name: skin wine
objects.description: A large leather wineskin lies here

objects.name: robes
objects.description: A small pile of black cloth lies here

objects.name: habit nuns
objects.description: A small pile of black cloth lies here

objects.name: wimple
objects.description: A small piece of black cloth lies here

objects.name: robes magi
objects.description: A small pile of black cloth lies here

objects.name: staff
objects.description: A large black staff lies on the floor

objects.name: bronze chestplate plate chest
objects.description: A piece of golden armour lies here

objects.name: helmet bronze
objects.description: A piece of golden armour lies here

objects.name: gloves bronze
objects.short_description: a pair of bronze mail gloves
objects.description: A small piece of golden armour lies here

objects.name: boots bronze
objects.short_description: a pair of bronze mail boots
objects.description: A piece of golden armour lies here

objects.name: sleeves mail bronze
objects.short_description: a pair of bronze mail sleeves
objects.description: Some golden armour lies here

objects.name: leggings mail bronze
objects.short_description: a pair of bronze mail leggings
objects.description: Some golden armour lies here

objects.name: sword bronze
objects.description: A golden sword lies here

objects.name: jerkin leather
objects.description: Some tattered leather lies here

objects.name: pants leather
objects.description: Some tattered leather lies here

objects.name: club branch wood
objects.description: A small piece of branch lies here

objects.name: bread loaf
objects.description: A stale loaf is here

objects.name: skin water canteen
objects.description: A small leather skin lies here

objects.name: ball light
objects.description: A bright ball of light shimmers in the air

objects.name: rock
objects.description: A small piece of *interesting* rock lies here

objects.name: rock
objects.description: A small piece of *interesting* rock lies here

objects.name: rock
objects.description: A small piece of *interesting* rock lies here

objects.name: sword steel
objects.description: A steel sword rests here.

objects.name: chain mail shirt
objects.description: A small pile of metal links lies here

objects.name: sword
objects.description: A standard sword rests here.

objects.name: urn clay
objects.description: A small urn lies here

extra_descr_data.description:
This small urn is used for storing the
internal organs removed during the
embalming proccess.

objects.name: key iron
objects.description: An iron key looks uninteresting

objects.name: pants cloth black
objects.description: A small pile of black cloth is lieing here

objects.name: cloak cloth black
objects.description: A small pile of black cloth is lieing here

objects.name: corpse
objects.description: A corpse lies here, prepared for animation

extra_descr_data.description:
This long dead person has been laid out
ready for reanimation. A future soldier
in someones planned army.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
You are standing in the entrance to the 
temple catacombs. 
Stone steps lead up into the light of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
These ancient stone passage ways are cool
and dark. Faint sounds from the city 
above drift down.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
It is almost restful down here. Even if
a little damp. Worn steps descend deeper
into the darkness here.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Strange moss grows on the walls here.
Worn stairs lead upwards, 
or you can continue into the darkness.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Strange echoes carry to you here. Your
spine tingles suddenly as heavy webs
brush lightly over your skin.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Ancient bronze plaques line the wall.
No longer golden yellow, but green with
verdi-gris.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Here and there in places, the ancient stones 
of this place are begining to crumble.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: More plaques line the walls.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Light spills into the passageway from the room to north, it would appear the
local priest is entertaining the nuns again.

exits.description:
An ancient wooden door bars your route
to the south.

extra_descr_data.description:
An ancient wooden door, its blackened
timbers bound with heavy brass supports.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: The passage way continues here.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
More plaques line the walls, on them you
recognise the names of long dead Mayor's
and town officials.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: More plaques line the walls here.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: The passage turns west here, more plaques line the walls.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: Worn steps lead upwards vague echos filter down from the city above.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Ancient worn stone steps descend into
the darkness here, faint tracks lead
onwards through the dust.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The passage twists to the south here.
As you move futher from the entrance
the light dims, as darkness surrounds you.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
A large stone slab is in the center of
the room, and on shelves around the
walls are urn's and jars of embalming
fliud.

The slab is not being used for its normal
purpose at the moment.

extra_descr_data.description:
A large heavy slab of granite, with a 
drainage channel down the centre. Strange
marks adorn its sides, obviously it
originates from an older time of more
elemental and demanding gods.

rooms.name: Upper Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Stone stairs lead downwards. The dust is
thick on the floor, and the tracks in them go only down.
None return.

exits.description: A heavy wooden door prevents your exit.

extra_descr_data.description:
An ancient oaken door, bound with heavy
brass supports.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Stone stairs lead upwards to safety.
You hear chanting echoing around these halls.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: Ancient bronze plaques line the walls here.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: More plaques line the walls.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Some of these niches have been opened.
The bodies are gone !.


Plaques lie scattered on the floor.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: The passage turns here. Again the corpses have been stolen.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Bones lie on the floor. Cracked open, the
marrow sucked out, and chewed white.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: A choice in the path. The chanting seems nearer now.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
More niches have been raided here. Amid
the clutter of plaques and bones you see
a loaf of bread, only just starting to
turn green.

As you look at the floor more closely, 
you can see the traces of recently spilled blood.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The passage turns here, shuffles and
scraping noises echo around.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: Amid the plaques are carvings in the stone walls.

extra_descr_data.description:
The bass relief carvings show the founding of Midgaard. 
Faded by the passage of time, the details are hard to make out.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
More empty niches line the walls.
The carvings continue here depicting
more history of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
For some strange reason there are no
plaques or niches on the south wall.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Faint brown marks stain the floor and walls here,
amid the stains are small
fragments of broken bone, something
truly horrible happened to someone here
once.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
There are tracks in the dust. Booted feet
made them, and not too long ago.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The tracks end abruptly here, on the
walls and ceiling are bloodstains, still
sticky but cold. There is no blood on the
floor.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The passageway continues here, more
niches, more plaques, more dust, and
more bass-relief carvings.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
You are sure youve been here before.
This junction looks so familiar.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The plaques on the wall here are so
ancient it is impossible to see the
names written on them.

extra_descr_data.description:
Herein lieth ye Bodye ov
ye Godde nowne as Rad.
Greate were his workes
ande mightye were his
threwes.

Left this realme in
the monthe ov ye winter
wolfe on ye day ov freedome.

You scrape away at the verdi-gris 
covering the plaque, and slowly the
letters become more clear.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The passage way bends here, many of the
niches in the walls have been disturbed.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Plaques line the walls, marking the
final resting places of ancient Hero's
and Gods of Midgaard. Thier body's sealed
away within the stones of the foundations
of the city above.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
Bronze plaques mark the niches of long
dead people who have been buried here.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
You hear a strange chanting echoing
through these halls, it sounds most
omnious and evil.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
The chanting is much nearer. Strange
shadows leap in your torchlight.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: The walls here seem strange.

exits.description:
Faint marks outline where a doorway is
concealed to the north.

Faint marks outline where a door is hidden
in the stones of the wall to the south.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
All of the niches have been emptied
here, you wonder where there occupants
have gone.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description:
All of the niches here are empty.
A few fragments of embalming cloth
lie on the floor, amidst scraps of
chewed bone.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: Dark silent stairs descend downwards.

exits.description:
A door is cleverly concealed from view
to the south.

rooms.name: Lower Level of the Temple Catacombs
rooms.description: Dark silent stairs descend downwards.

exits.description:
A door is cunningly disguised as a part
of the wall to the north.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Dark silent stairs ascend upwards.

Your breath fogs in the still chill
air.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Silence.
Deep profound silence. Then suddenly
a distant drumming thumping sound
begins.

Shapes move through the shadows, as
your blood continues to throb through
you.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
A faint scraping sound echoes through
these ancient halls.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Strange lichens and mosses cling to the
walls and ceiling. A faint glow seems to
emanate from them.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Stones ancient beyond reckoning line
these hallways. Symbols in a tongue
so old it has passed from knowledge
are barely legible.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Strange sounds echo eeriely around
these ancient hallways.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description: Soft moans echo through the still air.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Carvings line the walls. The language
unreadable.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway made from ancient
stone blocks, You havent even seen this
type of stone near midgaard.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Silence.
Glowing moss.


Clank..........

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Huge stone blocks line the walls.
Faded carvings and lines of small
pictures cover thier surfaces.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Yellow moss clings to stone walls.
A soft eerie glow shines from somewhere
within its strands.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
A strane scraping noise echoes around
the passageway, you feel the sensation
of hidden movement.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long silent
passage, huge stone blocks forming
the walls, floor and ceiling, strange
mosses and lichens hang like wispy
beards, a soft inner glow lighting up
thier trailing threads.

rooms.name: Upper Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Another long stone passageway. Faint
echoes carry on the still air.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description: A dark silent stairwell ascends upwards.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long stone passage.
Thick dust lies over the floor, tracks..

Booted tracks.
Leading onwards, Old tracks.
They do not return.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Small clouds of dust puff into the air,
as your footsteps obliterate the tracks
left behind long long ago.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
A slow, halting, shuffling echo carries
on the still air.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Faint echoes disturb the silence. Strands
of hanging moss twitch in a faint breeze.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long passage.
Strange coloured mosses hang from the
ceiling and cover the walls.
A thick layer of dust covers the floor.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Cold dark stone surrounds you. Mosses
glow softly in your lightsource.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
There is hole in the wall here.
Small fragments of broken stone litter
the floor.

extra_descr_data.description:
Carved long long ago, from the solid
rock. Then it has been magically
sealed.

Something has broken through the wall
here. As you examine the hole that is
left behind, you realise that is another
niche, and now it is empty.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Another niche has been broken open.
Only this one was breached from the
outside.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long stone passage.
Ancient writing line the walls, and 
beards of moss and lichen hang from
the ceiling.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Again faint marks are imprinted in the
dust on the floor. Ancient tracks, thier
maker long since departed.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
The passage way turns here.
Many of the niches have been broken
into.

And out of.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
There are faint marks on the walls.
Maybe the spell that was used to conceal
the final resting place of these people
was interupted.
Or failing with time.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
A niche has been broken open here.
Small pieces of rock litter the floor.
Strange pictures and scratches mark
the wall here.

It almost makes sense.

extra_descr_data.keyword: pictures picture scratch scratches mark marks
extra_descr_data.description:
The prophecy is fulfilled.

The old Gods have passed away, and
the new Gods have taken thier places.
Soon, upon this realm of mortal man,
the Devourer of Souls will descend.
And then all will belong to darkness.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
Someone has broken into the niches here.
They are all empty, and pieces of rock
litter the floor.

rooms.name: Lower Halls of the Dead
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long stone passage.
An empty square cut niche lies set into
the wall, it seems never to have been
used.
